LanguageData.MakeRailgun_Component.label: Make Railgun component
LanguageData.MakeRailgun_Component.description: Railgun components used as basis for craft Rail weapons. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakePowerBasic.label: Make basic power module
LanguageData.MakePowerBasic.description: Basic power module - the main source of energy for Avali's weapons and armor. Produces 2.
LanguageData.MakePowerAdv.label: Make advenced power module
LanguageData.MakePowerAdv.description: Advanced power module - the only source of energy in Avali's high-tech armor and weapons. Produces 1.
